mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM qna_board WHERE shopCode = #{shopCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board(shopCode, qnaNum, memId, qnaPasswd, subject, content, readCnt, ref, ref_step, ref_level, qna_date, ip) VALUES(#{shopCode}, qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{qnaPasswd}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, #{ref}, #{ref_step}, #{ref_level}, #{qna_date}, #{ip})
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_board SET ref_step = ref_step + 1 WHERE ref = #{ref} AND ref_step > #{ref_step}
